org.centenaire.general

Class GeneralController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.centenaire.general.GeneralController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, Observable

    public class GeneralController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    A class used to store data regarding the current state of the interface (e.g. currentEntity). Doubles as a singleton class giving access to the different Dao classes.
